Articles.Content:
How do you fly about the Kerbin environments? What is your longest range aircraft? What do you use to fly around KSC? Now is your chance to show us.

To start, here are my primary aircraft.

The Kesna II - Short range slow flyer for touring KSC, the island airfield, and the neighboring mountain range. With droppable external fuel tanks.

The Kesna IV - Medium range search and rescue craft. Capable of parachute landings and rover like driving (Wheels are out of view behind fuel tanks) for getting into tough terrain. With droppable external fuel tanks.

The Kesna V - Long range hypersonic flyer for polar missions and long range rescue and recovery. With droppable external fuel tanks.

The X-7R - Long range hypersonic flyer with detachable rover and refueling capabilities. (Capable of circumnavigating Kerbin via 2 refueling stations at the poles.

Aircraft, Rover, and Refueler(Dropped in from space)

Edited October 26, 2013 by wolfedg

that little rover thing is genius.

I prefer to make a little plane that detaches from a big plane when all my engines accidentally blow out, little escape pod, if you will.
